bl.bi: Initially developed by Keith Visco for the MITRE Corporation. Ported from XSL:P, a Java implementation of XSLT.
Contributed to the Mozilla project as a standalone processor.
Is now also available as a module working with Mozilla DOM documents.

Conformance: 3 major bugs
Forwardcompatible parsing RTF Namespace nodes

Bugs are mostly evangelised:
Mime-types XSLT Namespace (http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform)
